thread.title: Asia Stocks Waver Ahead of U.S. Jobs Report
thread.title_full: Asia Stocks Waver Ahead of U.S. Jobs Report - WSJ

author: Chao Deng
title: Asia Stocks Waver Ahead of U.S. Jobs Report
text:
Markets in Asia wavered Friday, as traders await a critical jobs report in the U.S. that could change expectations of when the Federal Reserve will raise interest rates.
Signs that the European Central Bank could ease policy further supported some buying. The Hang Seng Index was up 1.1% and Australiaâ€™s S&P ASX 200 was up 0.3%.
